sentences.sContent: Shingles is caused by varicella-zoster virus, which also causes chicken pox.
sentences.sContent_eng: Shingles is caused by varicella-zoster virus, which also causes chicken pox.
sentences.sCn: 带状疱疹由水痘一带状疱疹病毒引起，该病毒还能引起水痘。

sentences.sContent: Antiviral therapy is reserved for cases of varicella-zoster and herpes simplex infection.
sentences.sContent_eng: Antiviral therapy is reserved for cases of varicella-zoster and herpes simplex infection.
sentences.sCn: 对于水痘-带状疱疹及单纯疱疹病毒感染的病人可使用抗病毒疗法。

sentences.sContent: The most common virus responsible is adenovirus, but other viruses have also been identified including herpes simplex, varicella-zoster, picorna, pox, and human immunodeficiency virus.
sentences.sContent_eng: The most common virus responsible is adenovirus, but other viruses have also been identified including herpes simplex, varicella-zoster, picorna, pox, and human immunodeficiency virus.
sentences.sCn: 最常见的致病病毒是腺病毒，但科学家们也发现了其它种类的病毒，包括单纯疱疹病毒，水痘-带状疱疹病毒，以及人类免疫缺陷病毒等。

synos.tran: 带状疱疹；（古希腊男子用的）束带
